md:
giải nghĩa từ "dying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Dying (verb) - chết dần, chết mòn
	+ Meaning: to become weaker and weaker, and eventually die.
	+ Example: The old man was dying of cancer.
	+ Related words: death, dead, dying, die
	+ Antonyms: living, alive, surviving

* Dying (adjective) - sắp chết, gần chết
	+ Meaning: very close to death.
	+ Example: The dying patient was surrounded by his family.
	+ Related words: death, dead, dying, die
	+ Antonyms: living, alive, healthy

* Dying (noun) - sự chết dần, sự chết mòn
	+ Meaning: the process of becoming weaker and weaker, and eventually dying.
	+ Example: The dying of the old man was a sad event.
	+ Related words: death, dead, dying, die
	+ Antonyms: living, alive, surviving
